item.description:
About this Meetup Group

Hi All members of The Boston Drum Circle Meetup:

As Fall is approaching here, we are having our last outdoor Drum Circle of the season on the Banks of The River Charles! - If you've never Joined us for one of these outdoor DrumCircles, this is your chance to experience something magical! Playing along the River, having dancers, BBQ's - its a party in the making! And we move to Sat. Afternoons to make the party last!

Our next DrumCircle Meetup is Sat. Sept. 25th from 2-4 at the Charles River (Parking lot #4 near the Public Theatre - depending on parking availability) If it is too cold or raining, it will get canceled.

Hope to see you all there! Please bring a chair, water and your drum. Email me with questions. alan@drumconnection.com

Yours in Drumming Spirit,

Alan, Fanta, and Stu
DrumConnection Home
item.how_to_find_us: We start setting up about 30 minutes before the circle. You'll see us. Lost? Call 617.686.6080
item.name: The Boston Drum Circle - Back Outside at the Charles River!
